block.p: SCHALLOP-Arthur. Of N. Bellmore, NY, passed away on August 14, 2000. Beloved husband of Arlene, devoted father of Larry, Amy and Steven. Cherished ''Poppy'' of Amanda and Benji Schallop and Emily, Noah and Moriah Greenstein. Brother of Robert Schallop. Our love for you and the treasured memories we shared shall be in our hearts forever. Funeral services will be held at 10:30 AM on August 15 at Gutterman's Chapel, 175 Long Beach Rd., Rockville Centre, NY.
